Title: The Kenzo
Description: You can only down teens if all teens are injured or if you are enraged. You can also hit teens in lockers. If you break the rules you have to give up a stigma.

Title: The Sam
Description: You cannot move until you say out loud (in voice chat) a pun related to the stigma you just used to stun / kill

Title: The Karam
Description: Need to hit the monster in 3 sec after crafting a weapon; if 3 sec pass; discard the weapon and build another

Title: What are stairs?
Description: You must stay on the floor level you spawn on.

Title: One Trick Pony
Description: Before the game starts pick 1 weapon; You can only craft the chosen weapon and nothing else.

Title: Hot Potato
Description: If someone gives you an item; give it back.

Title: Phase Clan
Description: you can only attack after performing a full 360 with the camera.

Title: What's up?
Description: While traversing the map you have to be looking at the ceiling the entire time. (You can look around as long as youre standing still.)

Title: Lost my keys
Description: You must open every locker you pass by.

Title: The Munchies
Description: If you find a consumable on the ground or see a active vending machine you must pick up the consumable and eat it.

Title: Stiff knees
Description: you cannot use vaults.

Title: Overdue fees
Description: You must find the book of the dead and obtain it before the match ends.

Title: Is that a reference?
Description: You can only traverse the map with your back to a wall.

Title: Easily Distracted
Description: If you're chasing a teen and you see another teen you must switch targets and chase the new teen.

Title: Paper Trail
Description: you must constantly place stickers as you play.

Title: Frozen in Fear
Description: If one teen is hit; all teens must stop moving for 5 seconds.

Title: Red light Green light
Description: You cannot move if a teen is facing you; with line of sight.

Title: Roshambo
Description: You can only attack while being attacked.

Title: Movie Buff
Description: You can only communicate in Comms with the phrases from popular films

Title: No time to die
Description: Only running allowed

Title: Franklin's Demise
Description: If a monster hits you while you have a weapon and/or item you must dispose of that weapon and/or item

Title: Crafting Roulette
Description: If you dont land a perfect skill check; switch to the next available crafting station.

Title: Cooties
Description:
You cannot do anything that involves directly or indirectly touching another teen - this includes healing others; letting others heal you; handing items to others; or crafting at the same station as another teen. 
This does not include picking up downed teens (yourself or other teens).

Title: I got you! diagonally!
Description: You can only travel in diagonal lines

Title: Moon Walker
Description: you can only move backwards to travel

Title: Back where we started
Description: You can only respawn in your original spawn point after each stigma kill

Title: The Sauce Boss
Description: You may only craft molotovs this game.
column5: This should have the caveat *unless all other teens are dead

Title: Method Actor
Description: As Werewolf; if you howl in the game you must howl in real life

Title: Buddy System
Description: You must seek out and be with another teen at all times.

Title: I'm  Allergic
Description: Before the game starts; Pick a random Stigma type; you cannot attack a teen who has a weapon of the chosen stigma.

Title: Agoraphobia
Description: You must avoid wide open spaces; and cannot travel outdoors.

Title: Medical Neutrality
Description: Do not attack teens while they are healing.

Title: Limited Ammunition
Description: You may only attack 10 times; ammo replenishes if you lose a stigma.

Title: "Its visions based on movement"
Description: Do not attack teens who are standing still; and pretend you cannot see them.

Title: Victory Lap
Description: After killing a teen perform a full circuit of the map.

Title: The Erick
Description: Play with your mouse on 2500 DPI or more

Title: Naughty list
Description: You must down teens in alphabetical order

Title: Main Tank
Description: If possible you must try to take hits for other teens.

Title: Double Tap
Description: When you take a stigma you must stun the monster with the same stigma type before you can craft a different stigma type.

Title: Greedy Goblin
Description: When you find a pick-up; be it the floor; vending machine; you must pick it up and create a secret stash somewhere on the map of your collected loot.

Title: All eyes on you
Description: Only one teen can craft a non-curse stigma at a time if the monster is not yet killed with that stigma. Everyone else needs to craft Eye weapons. All curse stigmas crafted need to be Eye.

Title: Point and Click Adventure
Description: you cannot move unless you ping and you have to move to where you pinged.

Title: Leeroy Jenkins
Description: while you are trying to take a stigma you must shout 'Leeroooooooy Jenkins!'

Title: The Lure
Description: Be a decoy for other teens and use your body to lure the monster into ambushes

Title: Painfully Punny
Description: After finishing crafting a weapon make a pun related to that weapon; If you can't; dispose of that weapon.

Title: Peer Pressure
Description: If you see another teen do an emote you must instantly do the same emote. If you don't have that emote you must do another emote.

Title: The Quitter
Description: If you fail at a crafting station you have to abandon that station and craft somewhere else

Title: Trash Bandit
Description: If you spot a searchable trash can you must immeditately search it

Title: Bank Shot
Description: You can only try hit the monster with indirect fire bombs off the ceiling or walls
